about_the_game:
Passion Project

Inspired by beloved games such as Hollow knight, Celeste, and Sekiro, Kaiyos Castle a is Difficult, parry-based, action platformer set in a puzzle-like, non-linear world.

Venture Forward

Dive into the fairytale kingdom of Valora, a cute yet enigmatic world brimming with vibrant towns, enchanting critters, and hidden secrets. As you arrive by train, you find yourself in a strange land, devoid of memories, except for a postcard featuring the image of 3 faces on the back side. Progressing forward, you stumble upon a small, dilapidated village, a mere shell of its former glory. The hopeful villagers greet you, yearning to restore their beloved home to its former grandeur.

Game Features
  • Hand-crafted interconnected world with towns, enemies, and secrets.
  • Challenging platforming with expressive movement and fluidity.
  • Detailed pixel art brought to life with a cute aesthetic.
  • Combat with focus on Rhythm and parrying.
  • Challenging yet fair gameplay.
  • 8+ Unique handcrafted areas.
